location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.893 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Mr A Malcolm, merchant, Bushire

mods.abstract: Kemball informs Malcolm of the Envoy to Tehran's response to Malcolm's request for help (folio 35): that the Envoy considers Malcolm to have sufficient protection from Persian oppression, and that he declines to interfere with private commercial matters.
